25ns, 48-pin TSOP) :RAM: ''Nanya'' NT5CB128M16FP-DI 256MB ::(DDR3-1600, 2Gb, x16, 1.5v, 96-ball BGA) :Mini PCIe: J2 (52-pin, R274÷R279 on the board in the photos) Power Supply MU18-R120150-C5'' *[https://telegra.ph/OpenWrt-for-Beeline-SmartBox-PRO-09-29 ''Beeline SmartBox PRO'' OpenWrt firmware] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/beeline/beeline_smartbox_pro |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/beeline/smartbox_pro |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/t/adding-support-for-sercomm-s1500-clones-beeline-smartbox-pro-wifire-s1500-nbn/110065/2 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ramips |subtarget = mt7621 |arch = mipsel_24kc |support_started_version = 23.05.0 |current_supported_version = |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== 
  J4 
1 - GND
2 - Tx
3 - Vcc
4 - Rx
 ===Superuser account=== Superuser account gives you access to some additional settings and :allows to change network settings (initially locked by Beeline) To use it login to web admin panel with this account: *Login: '''SuperUser''' *Password: '''Beeline$martB0xPr0''' from v2.0.15: *Password: serial number ==Pictures==
'''User Images''' File:SmartBox Pro PCB 1.jpeg|PCB top File:SmartBox Pro PCB 2.jpeg|PCB bottom File:SmartBox Pro PCB top.jpeg|SmartBox Pro board
[[Has images::internal| ]] ==See also== *[[Beeline SmartBox]] N300 Wireless Router :CPU: [[Realtek]] RTL8197D @660MHz :Flash: 16MB, RAM: 64MB :WLAN: 802.11bgn 2х2 MIMO *[[Beeline SmartBox One]] N600 Wireless Router :CPU: [[Realtek]] RTL8197DL @700MHz :Flash: 16MB, RAM: 64MB :WLAN 2.4GHz: 802.11bgn 2х2 MIMO :WLAN 5GHz: 802.11an 2х2 MIMO [[Category:English Documentation]]
